name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Edwin GOMEZ, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Edwin GOMEZ, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of May, 2003, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, LIMITED to the following issue:
Whether the trial court erred in concluding that Petitioner failed to satisfy the reasonable diligence requirement for after-discovered evidence.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
823 A.2d 141
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Edwin GOMEZ, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 8, 2003.
